template_input_params.name: allow_unverified_ssl
template_input_params.description: Communication with vsphere server with self signed certificate
template_input_params.label: Communication with vsphere server with self signed certificate

template_input_params.name: mariadb_user
template_input_params.label: mariadb User
template_input_params.description: User to be added into db and sshed into servers; Allow 1 to 16 alphanumeric characters with beginning at letters

template_input_params.name: mariadb_pwd
template_input_params.label: mariadb User Password
template_input_params.description: User password for cam user; Allow 8 to 16 alphanumeric characters

template_input_params.name: mariadb_ssh_user
template_input_params.label: mariadb Server SSH User
template_input_params.description: The user for ssh connection to mariadb server, which is default in template

template_input_params.name: mariadb_ssh_user_password
template_input_params.label: mariadb Server SSH User Password
template_input_params.description: The user password for ssh connection to mariadb server, which is default in template

template_input_params.name: php_ssh_user
template_input_params.label: PHP Server SSH User
template_input_params.description: The user for ssh connection to PHP server, which is default in template

template_input_params.name: php_ssh_user_password
template_input_params.label: PHP Server SSH User Password
template_input_params.description: The user password for ssh connection to PHP server, which is default in template

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm-name
template_input_params.description: Short hostname of mariadb vm
template_input_params.label: mariadb short hostname

template_input_params.name: php-vm-name
template_input_params.description: Short hostname of php mv
template_input_params.label: PHP short hostname

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_dns_servers
template_input_params.description: DNS servers for the virtual network adapter
template_input_params.label: DNS Servers - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_dns_suffixes
template_input_params.description: Name resolution suffixes for the virtual network adapter
template_input_params.label: DNS Suffixes - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_root_disk_keep_on_remove
template_input_params.description: Delete template disk volume when the virtual machine is deleted
template_input_params.label: Delete template disk volume when the virtual machine is deleted - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_domain
template_input_params.description: Domain Name of virtual machine
template_input_params.label: Domain Name - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm-image
template_input_params.description: Operating system image id / template that should be used when creating the virtual image
template_input_params.label: Operating System ID / Template - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_root_disk_size
template_input_params.description: Size of template disk volume. Should be equal to template's disk size
template_input_params.label: Root Disk Size - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_root_disk_controller_type
template_input_params.description: Type of template disk controller
template_input_params.label: Template Disk Controller - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_root_disk_datastore
template_input_params.description: Data store or storage cluster name for target virtual machine's disks
template_input_params.label: Template Disk Datastore - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_root_disk_type
template_input_params.description: Type of template disk volume
template_input_params.label: Template Disk Type - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_ipv4_gateway
template_input_params.description: IPv4 gateway for vNIC configuration
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Gateway Address - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_ipv4_address
template_input_params.description: IPv4 address for vNIC configuration
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine IP Address - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_memory
template_input_params.description: Memory assigned to the virtual machine in megabytes. This value is required to be an increment of 1024
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Memory - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_ipv4_prefix_length
template_input_params.description: IPv4 prefix length for vNIC configuration. The value must be a number between 8 and 32
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Netmask Prefix - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_number_of_vcpu
template_input_params.description: Number of virtual CPU for the virtual machine, which is required to be a positive Integer
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine vCPUs - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_network_interface_label
template_input_params.description: vSphere port group or network label for virtual machine's vNIC
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine vSphere Port Group - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_cluster
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere cluster to host the virtual machine
template_input_params.label: vSphere Cluster - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_datacenter
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere datacenter for virtual machine creation
template_input_params.label: vSphere Datacenter - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_folder
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere folder for virtual machine
template_input_params.label: vSphere Folder Name - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_adapter_type
template_input_params.description: Network adapter type for vNIC Configuration
template_input_params.label: vSphere Network Adapter Type - mariadb-vm

template_input_params.name: mariadb-vm_resource_pool
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere Resource Pool to host the virtual machine
template_input_params.label: vSphere Resource Pool - mariadb-vm
